languages.text: "Данная форма статистического прорицания почитаема и весьма редка. Но технобрат Авель искусен в данном обращении к Деус Механикус".
"It is an extremely rare and venerated form of statistical augury. But Tech-Brother Abel is adept at this form of appealing to the Deus Mechanicus."
languages.original_text: "Данная форма статистического прорицания почитаема и весьма редка. Но технобрат Авель искусен в данном обращении к Деус Механикус".

traits.locale_text: "It is a fairly rare and venerated form of statistical augury. But Tech-Brother Abel is adept at this form of appealing to the Deus Mechanicus."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It is an extremely rare and venerated form of statistical augury. But Tech-Brother Abel is adept at this form of appealing to the Deus Mechanicus."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「それは極めて稀で、 統計的な予言として尊重されています。しかし技術同胞のアベルはこのデウス・メカニクスへの嘆願書でアデプトになっているのです」
languages.original_text: "It is an extremely rare and venerated form of statistical augury. But Tech-Brother Abel is adept at this form of appealing to the Deus Mechanicus."

traits.locale_text: 「それは極めて稀で、 統計的な予言として尊重されています。しかし技術同胞のアベルはこのデウス・メカニクスへの嘆願書でアデプトになっているのです」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “只有极少数人才懂得如何进行这种精妙的统计方式，但技术兄弟亚伯非常擅长通过这种方式向万机之神祈祷。”
languages.original_text: "It is an extremely rare and venerated form of statistical augury. But Tech-Brother Abel is adept at this form of appealing to the Deus Mechanicus."

traits.locale_text: “只有极少数人才懂得如何进行这种精妙的统计方式，但技术兄弟亚伯非常擅长通过这种方式向万机之神祈祷。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Es handelt sich um eine extrem seltene und hochverehrte Form statistischer Weissagung. Tech-Bruder Abel beherrscht diese Kontaktaufnahme mit dem Deus Mechanicus ziemlich gut."
languages.original_text: "It is an extremely rare and venerated form of statistical augury. But Tech-Brother Abel is adept at this form of appealing to the Deus Mechanicus."

traits.locale_text: "Es handelt sich um eine recht seltene und hochverehrte Form statistischer Weissagung. Tech-Bruder Abel beherrscht diese Kontaktaufnahme mit dem Deus Mechanicus ziemlich gut."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « C'est une forme extrêmement rare et estimée de présages statistiques, mais le technofrère Abel maîtrise à la perfection cette manière d'en appeler au Deus Mechanicus. »
languages.original_text: "It is an extremely rare and venerated form of statistical augury. But Tech-Brother Abel is adept at this form of appealing to the Deus Mechanicus."

traits.locale_text: « C'est une forme fort rare et estimée de présages statistiques, mais le technofrère Abel maîtrise à la perfection cette manière d'en appeler au Deus Mechanicus. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Se trata de un método muy inusual y venerable de augurio estadístico. Pero el tecnohermano Abel es ducho en esta forma de apelar al Deus Mechanicus».
languages.original_text: "It is an extremely rare and venerated form of statistical augury. But Tech-Brother Abel is adept at this form of appealing to the Deus Mechanicus."

traits.locale_text: «Se trata de un método muy inusual y venerable de augurio estadístico. Pero el tecnohermano Abel es ducho en esta forma de apelar al Deus Mechanicus».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Prosedür, istatistiksel alametin son derece nadir ve saygı duyulan bir biçimidir. Tekno Kardeş Abel ise Deus Mechanicus'a bu şekilde hitap etme konusunda son derece yetkindir."
languages.original_text: "It is an extremely rare and venerated form of statistical augury. But Tech-Brother Abel is adept at this form of appealing to the Deus Mechanicus."

traits.locale_text: "İstatistiksel alametin son derece nadir ve saygı duyulan bir biçimidir ancak Tekno Kardeş Abel, Deus Mechanicus'a bu hitap etme biçiminde son derece yetkin."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
